verificationEmailExplanation: We're ready to activate your account. All we need to do is make sure this is your email address.
verificationEmailContactUs: If you're having any issues with your account, just reply to this email and we'll help.
changePasswordExplanation: We received a request to change the password for your Maptio account.
changePasswordIntro: If you made this request, please click the button below to reset your password.
changePasswordOutro: If you did not make this request, please check that you can still log in to your account, and contact us by replying to this email and we'll help.
inviteEmailSubject: {{ nameOfInvitationSender }} invited you to join organization "{{ team }}" on Maptio
inviteEmailExplanation: You've been invited to join {{ team }} in Maptio - the online tool for visualizing organizations.
inviteEmailCTAIntro: Your Maptio account is ready for you, all you need to do is set a password by clicking the link below.
inviteEmailContactUs: If you're having any issues with accessing Maptio, just reply to this email and we'll help.
contactIfNotRequested: If you did not make this request, please contact us by replying to this email.
contactIfNotRequestedInvite: If you did not expect this invite and do not recognise the organization you have been invited to join, please contact us by replying to this email.
